required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Trail of CDK4 / 6 Inhibitor and MEK Inhibitor in the Treatment of Metastatic Digestive System Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Clinical Study on the Safety and Tolerability of a CDK4 / 6 Inhibitor and a MEK Inhibitor in the Treatment of Metastatic Digestive System Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective, open, phase I clinical study to evaluate the safety and tolerability of a CDK4 / 6 inhibitor and a MEK inhibitor in the treatment of metastatic digestive system tumors

primary_outcome.measure: To determine the maximum tolerated dose of a CDK4 / 6 inhibitor and a MEK inhibitor therapy

arm_group.arm_group_label: a CDK4 / 6 inhibitor and a MEK inhibitor
arm_group.description: Participants will receive a CDK4 / 6 inhibitor and a MEK inhibitor treatment

intervention.intervention_name: a CDK4 / 6 inhibitor and a MEK inhibitor
intervention.description: Participant will receive a CDK4 / 6 inhibitor and a MEK inhibitor treatment to determine the maximum tolerated dose
intervention.arm_group_label: a CDK4 / 6 inhibitor and a MEK inhibitor
